## nvd3-dp

### How to build
```
npm i -g gulp
npm i -g bower
```

```
cd chart-library
npm i
gulp
```

```
cd nvd3-extended
npm i
gulp
```

### Gulp tasks
* build
* watch 
* prod

Running prod task produces both normal and minified version.

### Contributing
Feel free to improve something using feature-branch then pull request.
